website_summaries.verdict: Powerful and suited for all washing machines, Arm & Hammer's liquid detergent is a good option for families who need to launder lots of clothes on a budget.
pros: This low-cost option sacrifices nothing in the way of cleaning power
The easy-dispense spout lets users control exactly the amount they want
Detergent is phosphate-free and biodegradable, with a clean and pleasant scent
Works well on clothes with normal soil levels
cons: It may not remove tougher stains like blood and grass as well as higher-end products

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, but shipping via USPS is the main downfall
customer_reviews.text: I must admit, this is a good deal; however there is a downfall. The main negative I have is that I would put out a word of caution to 1) realize this has to go through the postal service and there is the strong possibility it will arrive leaking all inside the box. And 2), it didn’t find this out until later, but when I got ready to the detergent, placing it right side down, the nozzle (twisted as tight as it possibly could go) leaked everywhere! I highly recommend reviewing the advantages and disadvantages before you move forward.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Blue

customer_reviews.title: Arm & Hammer 2X Ultra  Clean Burst
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my brother..when I ask him how was it, he say he love the scent,and his children didn't have any problems..his baby boy have sensitive skin and it didn't bother him....he love it and that make me happy...I plan on buying it again every month for him..
customer_reviews.author: charmaine

customer_reviews.title: Makes me laundry confident
customer_reviews.text: This go to makes me stop asking questions and just get stuff done in the laundry room. It takes care of just about everything. I don't need several extra products, just softener. I really like the pump out construction. The bottle construction helps to keep things neat. Also, I have sensitive skin and switching to this helped a great deal. I really prefer it. This has been a house staple for 6 years now. What else can I say?
customer_reviews.author: Heather MacLeod Wigell

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I switched from pods to liquid with my new washer because of the way it fills up. I will be returning to pods when gone. The detergent is very good no matter what form it comes in powder, pods or liguid. I would recommend this product on all materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Barber

customer_reviews.title: been using for years
customer_reviews.text: Started using when a student of mine did a science project of which detergent worked best, and found arm & hammer worked as well as the more expensive brands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price and we love the scent! It’s so nice to have this delivered to the house instead of lugging it in from the car lol
customer_reviews.author: Miss Lady03

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price compared to other quality brands of detergent.
customer_reviews.text: The main reason I ordered this product is the price. I tried it at a friend's house and was pleasantly surprised when all the stains were removed. Quite a savings without compromising quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't be "that guy" on the subway. DO LAUNDRY!!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that we no longer have to pound our clothes between 2 rocks along the riverbank. These automated washers, and the detergent that go in them, come in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P.

customer_reviews.title: Good product good service.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for many years and think it is comparable to tide with performance, without the hefty price of Tide. BF was upset that I switched until he seen that this works just as well as Tide.
customer_reviews.author: TnTnL

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the size
customer_reviews.text: Scent is not as vivid as i like but, gets clothes clean very nicely
customer_reviews.author: John Hankins

customer_reviews.title: Ok product.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an ok product, I mistakenly bought this instead of the unscented one but it got my clothes clean but I didn’t like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: lavern francis

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I have had no issues from using this and was a great price
customer_reviews.author: JOANIE SWINDLE

customer_reviews.title: Overall fair product
customer_reviews.text: Good overall, the spout drips a bit though. I have to turn the jug on it’s side to prevent it from leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works well with a nice scent, not too strong
customer_reviews.text: Works well with a nice scent that is not too strong
customer_reviews.author: Ohio mom

customer_reviews.title: For the price point it's the best one out there.
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done for the price it comes for. Only complain I'd have is that it doesn't have that strong of smell, not that it smells bad but it's not that strong. Cleans your clothes really well.
customer_reviews.author: shreyash kathiriya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great value - and I didn't have to go to the store!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Atwood

customer_reviews.title: paybills
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that when the liquid soak in ur clothes real gd it make a pleasant scent also it kills germs I love Amazon period
customer_reviews.author: Brian howell

customer_reviews.title: It's really good
customer_reviews.text: I used it for laundry, and it washes the clothes very clean. I intended to purchased one more for a friend. Hopefully I might get a discount.
customer_reviews.author: Georgianne Wray

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat This Detergent At All
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for years. It smells clean, not overpowering at all but really cleans clothes as well as the higher-priced Detergents I've used. I like to Blend scents in winter, it reminds me of spring so I get this and yes, I have seasonal blends but thats just me :)
customer_reviews.author: Grace Miller

customer_reviews.title: This is what laundry should smell like.
customer_reviews.text: Cleans great. Doesn’t irritate my sensitive skin. Smells so good. A very clean fresh scent. When I think of a clean basket of laundry, this is what it would smell like.
customer_reviews.author: CLWLPN

product_meta.title: Arm & Hammer 2X Ultra Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent 210 oz WLM (1)
product_meta.description: The Arm & Hammer 2X Ultra Clean Burst Liquid Laundry Detergent 210-oz bottle is a great addition to your laundry supplies. It will leave your clothes smelling fresh every time you wash. The formula is phosphate-free and contains biodegradable surfactants. Arm & Hammer Liquid Laundry Detergent is suitable for all washing machines, including high-efficiency models. The bottle has a unique design for added convenience. It has a sturdy handle so you can easily move it and a spout that lets you dispense the exact amount you want.
feature_bullets: Arm & Hammer Ultra Clean Laundry Detergent cleans approximately 140 loads
